 21  import numpy as np 
 22  from imusim.maths import vectors 
 23  from imusim.trajectories.base import PositionTrajectory, RotationTrajectory 
 24  from imusim.maths.quaternions import Quaternion 
 25  from imusim.utilities.caching import CacheLastValue 
 26  from imusim.utilities.documentation import prepend_method_doc 

 27   
 28 -class OffsetTrajectory(PositionTrajectory, RotationTrajectory): 

 29      """ 
 30      Trajectory at an offset from another trajectory. 
 31   
 32      @ivar parent: the L{AbstractTrajectory} from which this one inherits 
 33      @ivar positionOffset: the offset from the parent trajectory in the parent 
 34          local co-ordinate frame 
 35      @ivar rotationOffset: the rotation offset from the parent trajectory 
 36      """ 
 37   

 38 -    def __init__(self, parent, positionOffset=None, rotationOffset=None): 

 39          """ 
 40          Initialise trajectory. 
 41   
 42          @param parent: the L{AbstractTrajectory} which this trajectory follows. 
 43          @param positionOffset: the offset vector from the parent trajectory in the 
 44              co-ordinate frame of the parent. (3x1 L{np.ndarray}) 
 45          @param rotationOffset: the rotational offset from the parent trajectory 
 46              (L{Quaternion}) 
 47          """ 
 48          self.parent = parent 
 49          if positionOffset is None: 
 50              self.positionOffset = np.zeros((3,1)) 
 51          else: 
 52              self.positionOffset = positionOffset 
 53          if rotationOffset is None: 
 54              self.rotationOffset = Quaternion() 
 55          else: 
 56              self.rotationOffset = rotationOffset 

 57   
 58      @CacheLastValue() 

 59 -    def position(self, t): 

 60          p = self.parent.position(t) 
 61          r = self.parent.rotation(t) 
 62          return p + r.rotateVector(self.positionOffset) 

 63   
 64      @CacheLastValue() 

 65 -    def velocity(self, t): 

 66          v = self.parent.velocity(t) 
 67          r = self.parent.rotation(t) 
 68          o = r.rotateVector(self.positionOffset) 
 69          omega = self.parent.rotationalVelocity(t) 
 70          rv = vectors.cross(omega, o) 
 71          return v + rv 

 72   
 73      @CacheLastValue() 
 74      @prepend_method_doc(PositionTrajectory) 

 75 -    def acceleration(self, t): 

 76          """ 
 77          Uses the algorithm from Young et al. 2010 'Distributed Estimation 
 78          of Linear Acceleration for Improved Accuracy in Wireless Inertial 
 79          Motion Capture' to calculate linear acceleration from rotational 
 80          velocity and acceleration 
 81          """ 
 82          a = self.parent.acceleration(t) 
 83          r = self.parent.rotation(t) 
 84          o = r.rotateVector(self.positionOffset) 
 85          omega = self.parent.rotationalVelocity(t) 
 86          alpha = self.parent.rotationalAcceleration(t) 
 87          lt = vectors.cross(alpha, o) 
 88          lr = vectors.dot(o, omega) * omega - o * vectors.norm(omega)**2 
 89          return a + lt + lr 

 90   
 91      @CacheLastValue() 

 92 -    def rotation(self, t): 

 93          return self.parent.rotation(t) * self.rotationOffset 

 94   

 95 -    def rotationalVelocity(self, t): 

 96          return self.parent.rotationalVelocity(t) 

 97   

 98 -    def rotationalAcceleration(self, t): 

 99          return self.parent.rotationalAcceleration(t) 

100   
101      @property 

102 -    def startTime(self): 

103          return self.parent.startTime 

104   
105      @property 

106 -    def endTime(self): 

107          return self.parent.endTime
